mapper.select: select product_form from sequence where seq_code = #{seqCode};
mapper.insert: insert into product_number (product_num, product_full_name, seq_code) values(1, #{productFullName}, #{seqCode});
update product_number set product_num = product_num + 1 where product_id = #{productId};
mapper.select: select distinct product_num from product_number t1 left join product_log t2 on t1.product_id = t2.product_id where seq_code = #{seqCode} and product_full_name = #{productFullName};
